tool_description: This API instantly generates high quality speech from text. Simply send a request with the text you want read, and we'll instantly return a wav, mp3, or ogg with it been spoken!
name: Text-to-speech
title: Text-to-speech

api_list.name: /v1/tts/voices

required_parameters.name: language
required_parameters.description: Returns the names of voices that are available for the given language

api_list.name: /v1/tts/languages
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tts.p.rapidapi.com/v1/tts/languages"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tts.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://tts.p.rapidapi.com/v1/tts/languages"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tts.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: /v1/tts
api_list.description: Converts text into high quality speech.

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: Whatever text you want to be converted into audio

required_parameters.name: format
required_parameters.description: wav, mp3, and ogg file formats are supported

optional_parameters.name: voice
optional_parameters.description: See /v1/tts/voices for details on how to query the installed voices
optional_parameters.default: The name of the voice you wish to use.

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: See /v1/tts/languages to query the available languages
optional_parameters.default: The language you wish to use (default is usenglish)
